sub_title: Senior Associate Energy - Africa at FMO - Dutch entrepreneurial development bank
summary:
Committed and driven finance professional willing to have an impact and be active in the future of energy production, access and consumption.

A set of skills in corporate finance, financial modelling and strategy combined with acknowledged business acumen, communication and interpersonal skills as key assets to work in multidisciplinary teams, build trustful relationships and originate and execute business development opportunities.

Proven track record of agility, resilience and successful team work in complex environments and challenging projects.

French and Ivorian citizen. Lived, studied and worked on three different continents, easily adapting in international contexts and multicultural teams.
